body:
Like it says up there, I will be starting a build server in 2-3 days and when a new player spawns they get all the stone tools with it (custom from essentials/groupmanager) and I wanted to know the command for clearing peoples inventory with the command block or if there is another way.

Thanks 
:3
body_tagged:
Like it says up there, I will be starting a build server in 2-3 days and when a new player spawns they get all the stone tools with it (custom from essentials/groupmanager) and I wanted to know the command for clearing peoples inventory with the command block or if there is another way.

title: clear inv with command block

replies.body: dosnt work on command blocks...  just to /ci
replies.body_tagged: dosnt work on command blocks...  just to /ci

replies.body: I won't be on the server for 24/7 does :/ I don't want new people running around in the lobby with stone sword and all that :/
replies.body_tagged: I won't be on the server for 24/7 does :/ I don't want new people running around in the lobby with stone sword and all that :/

reply_to.body: dosnt work on command blocks...  just to /ci
reply_to.body_tagged: dosnt work on command blocks...  just to /ci

replies.body: I just use the /ci (player name) command.
replies.body_tagged: I just use the /ci (player name) command.

reply_to.body: I just use the /ci (player name) command.
reply_to.body_tagged: I just use the /ci (player name) command.

replies.body: If your looking to do it off command block, just place down a pressure plate and write in it ' clear @p ' it will clear the nearest player when they walk on it.
replies.body_tagged: If your looking to do it off command block, just place down a pressure plate and write in it ' clear @p ' it will clear the nearest player when they walk on it.

replies.body: Disable the kit tools from essentials then
replies.body_tagged: Disable the kit tools from essentials then
